Reviews.Title: I love it!!!
Reviews.Author: FireFox II
Reviews.Content: Cameta Camera is awesome!!! The lowest price I have found.  My kit came to the house on time and everything in the kit were all there.  They did not miss a thing.  The Nikon D3200 from CAMETA CAMERA performed beautifully. I was impressed with the quality of the tripod. It was not cheaply made nor was it flimsy. The 70 - 300mm lens that came with the kit is amazing. I strongly recommend buying this product from CAMETA CAMERA!!

Reviews.Title: Love it !!!
Reviews.Author: CS
Reviews.Content: Chose this package because of all the "extras" included. Decent price. Enjoying learning all the things I can do with it.
